tasks.title: MVP-Lite Day 2: Multi-Input Upload & Process Page
tasks.description: Build the Process page with multi-input support (File/URL/Text/Audio) and agent selection

context.goal: Create upload interface supporting all 4 input types with agent selection
context.dependency_note: Use mock agent data if /api/agents not ready yet

deliverables: Create /process page with this EXACT layout:
- Dynamic content area based on selected tab:
‚Ä¢ File: Drag-drop zone 'Drop PDF here or click to browse'
‚Ä¢ Text: Textarea with 'Paste your content here...'
‚Ä¢ Audio: Drag-drop zone 'Drop MP3/WAV or click to browse'
- File type validation (PDF for files, MP3/WAV/M4A for audio)
- Radio button list with agent cards
- Each card shows: icon, name, description
- Mock data for 4 agents if API not ready:
- Reuse existing FileUploadModal logic if applicable
Filter agents based on input type:
- Tab navigation using Tailwind UI patterns
- Disabled until input and agent selected
- Stores form data in state (for Day 3 integration)
- Shows loading state when clicked (mock for now)
- Fall back to mock data if API returns error

api_endpoints: GET /api/agents - Returns list of available agents (use mock if not ready)
technical_requirements.validation_rules: PDF only for file type, valid URL format, text max 50k chars, audio: MP3/WAV/M4A only

dependencies: GET /api/agents endpoint (use mock data if not ready)
tasks.signals_when_done: Process page complete with all 4 input types working, agent selection filters by input type, validation shows errors, responsive design
tasks.autonomy_level: HIGH - Make design decisions that improve UX while following specifications
tasks.special_instructions: This is the core feature of the MVP - make it intuitive and delightful to use. The file upload should feel smooth.
tasks.process_reminder: Update status to 'in_progress' when starting, commit code frequently, update to 'ready_for_review' when complete

history.summary: MVP-Lite Day 1: Foundation & Dashboard UI completed
history.completion_message: Successfully built dashboard UI with routing for 4 pages, navigation layout, welcome screen with CTAs, and recent results display. All responsive breakpoints tested. Ready for Day 2.
deliverables_completed: Dashboard with welcome message and process/agents CTAs
Shared UI components (Button, Card, LoadingSpinner, ErrorMessage)
Mobile responsive design with bottom navigation

history.summary: UI Components Audit and API Requirements Definition completed for Sprint 4 Integration
history.completion_message: Successfully completed comprehensive audit of all AIOS v2 UI components and defined complete API requirements. Delivered updated OpenAPI specification, WebSocket events documentation, and UI-backend mapping covering file processing, agent management, knowledge repository, analytics, and DAG operations. Ready for backend API implementation in Week 2.
deliverables_completed: /docs/api/openapi.yaml - Complete AIOS v2 API specification with 25+ endpoints
Identified 5 missing API methods in existing client implementation
Documented cross-component integration patterns and performance optimizations

history.summary: Demo Video Production & User Onboarding Assets completed
history.completion_message: Complete demo video production guide, interactive onboarding system, 10 agent templates, email sequence, and Product Hunt launch kit created. Ready for successful AIOS v2 launch.

history.completion_message: Successfully implemented agent status dashboard UI with all deliverables. Dashboard accessible at localhost:3000 with real-time agent monitoring, task progress visualization, and comprehensive API endpoints.

history.summary: AIOS v2 User Documentation & Onboarding Experience completed with full user adoption system
history.completion_message: User documentation and onboarding completed with interactive onboarding flow, comprehensive help system, tutorial system, contextual tooltips, FAQ system, feedback system, accessibility features, and user preferences. Ready for seamless user adoption of AIOS v2 MVP.

Successfully completed comprehensive repository cleanup with 28 files archived, 3 phase directories moved, 35+ empty directories cleaned, and 4 new documentation categories created. Repository is now production-ready with clean structure and complete traceability.

history.summary: Production Launch Assets - Landing Page & Marketing Materials completed with full conversion optimization
history.completion_message: Complete landing page with 7 React components, demo video script, and comprehensive social media marketing assets created. Production-ready for AIOS v2 launch with conversion-optimized user acquisition funnel.
